alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 07 at 2:55PM CDT until April 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS THIS AFTERNOON AND AGAIN ON SATURDAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING AND AGAIN SATURDAY FROM NOON TO 8PM FOR STRONG WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR ALL OF SOUTH CENTRAL NEBRASKA AND NORTH CENTRAL KANSAS... The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM CDT Saturday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. A Red Flag Warning remains in effect today until 8pm. * WINDS...South 15 to 25 mph with gusts 30 to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 to 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly. Use caution if engaging in activities that could result in fire ignition.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
